{"id":1311813539,"question_id":3264,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1720281112,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1311813539/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Points After Enemy Battles","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumPoints(vector<int>& enemyEnergies, int currentEnergy) {\n        \n        long long sum = 0;\n        \n        sort(enemyEnergies.begin(), enemyEnergies.end());\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<enemyEnergies.size(); i++){\n            \n            if(currentEnergy % enemyEnergies[i] && sum){\n                sum += enemyEnergies[i]%currentEnergy;\n                \n                if(currentEnergy >= enemyEnergies[i]){\n                    currentEnergy = currentEnergy - enemyEnergies[i];\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                sum += currentEnergy/enemyEnergies[i];\n            }\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-points-after-enemy-battles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
